Name: Metronome
Effect: Single Target. Copy Move. Roll a die to determine Physical or Special category, roll a die to determine this Move's Power. The appearance, Type and added effects of this Move becomes the same of a Physical or Special Move of the same Power at Storyteller's Discretion.
